About.Hours & facilities:
11am-3pm Mon to Sun. Special openings outside these hours by appointment. Assistance available by mail for a donation. Books, journals, photographs, newspapers, cemetery indexes, maps, pertaining to the Echuca / Moama (NSW) area.


Email research enquiries also accepted. First request $20 then $20 per hour thereafter.

About.Acquisition focus: The Society relies on donations of photographs, manuscripts, and any items relating to the history of the Murray River boats and the local area.
